lead_paragraph: Marlies Schild kept the Austrian women on course for a clean sweep of the 2007 Alpine ski World Cup titles yesterday by taking the slalom crown with her sixth win of the season, in Sierra Nevada, Spain.
snippet: Marlies Schild kept the Austrian women on course for a clean sweep of the 2007 Alpine ski World Cup titles yesterday by taking the slalom crown with her sixth win of the season, in Sierra Nevada, Spain.
